name: Black 'n' White (kaeveris)
description:
Game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4. Theme: Connect

In this game you help two little creatures to overcome obstacles. They are connected to each another, one cannot win without the other. 

Use WASD/arrows to move black/white creature

***For some reason WEB GL version has sound issues  which downloadable version does not have***

Additionally I decided to contribute to couple of jam's challenges!

  • Extra Open - source files - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1hkxr0km8otvx7hm7nzsQH-8SfFpPVXt6
  • Extra Remix - the hearts were taken from the game I made for LD44 - We Are Nuts
  • "Extra"-Vert - you can play this game with another person! One player controls black creature, second player controls white creature
  • Extra Monochromatic - only 1 hue used in the game
